verbs.description: Amid Donald Trump 's attack on Amazon , the 2016 Democratic presidential candidate [V: is] calling for closer scrutiny of the retail giant 's " power and influence . "
[ARGM-LOC: Amid Donald Trump 's attack on Amazon] , [ARG0: the 2016 Democratic presidential candidate] is [V: calling] [ARG1: for closer scrutiny of the retail giant 's " power and influence] . "
